abstract: The evidence, to date, is not conclusive.
snippet: The evidence, to date, is not conclusive.
lead_paragraph: Has freer trade decreased or increased poverty and inequality in India? The debate has persisted, almost from the very beginning of India's embrace of the global economy in 1991.Curiously, also exactly 20 years ago, Americans were engaged in a similar battle of ideas. Mapping its intellectual contours helps give us a fix on the current Indian situation.
